abstract: Herman Cain's presidential campaign announced it would run ads on on the Rush Limbaugh Show.
snippet: Herman Cain's presidential campaign announced it would run ads on on the Rush Limbaugh Show.
lead_paragraph: Any notion that Herman Cain was going to fade into the background as Gov. Rick Perry and Mitt Romney took center stage after last week's debate can be dispatched with.

headline.main: Cain to Begin Ad Campaign, While Video Draws Notice
